cast.name: 鲁兹贝赫·拉希迪 Rouzbeh Rashidi

introduction: The Kingdom Of Shadows is a mystical cinematic experience which stirs from the darkness the spirits of our ancestors and reawakens the horror of unresolved crimes and denied desires. A family trapped in a house are tormented by unseen forces, a lost figure desperately attempts to escape his crimes, two lovers drift in eternal darkness and a hooded alchemist seeks the key to transformation. Shot on location in Portugal with an international cast, The Kingdom Of Shadows is a surrealist vision inspired by dreams, biblical myths, alchemy and family history.
